alert.note: Alert for Russell; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 11:57PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Russell and northeastern Washington Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1157 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Davenport to near Claypool Hill. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Glade Spring, Honaker, Dye, Lindell, Emory-Meadow View and Rosedale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
